html:
6.28.20  3:27 pm   Do you plan on inventing a new color any time soon?

      no

6.28.20  2:58 pm   Do you back your creations with complex music theroy, or do you just go with your gut feeling instead?

      the whole point of theorizing is to try to understand what you already knew to be the feelings. so in that sense it would be the feelings that are backing the theory. that's feels theory. and music = feels, so

6.28.20  2:25 pm   Least favorite type of pasta

      extremely good, high quality pasta

6.28.20  2:05 pm   hi bill, i wanted to ask that is it possible to learn to play piano professionally through online tutorials? are there any good sources? im having a hard time learning piano.

      what i recommend is to sort of daydream at a keyboard by the window for 4 to 9 thousand hours. i'm not entirely sure if that works for everyone, but it works for me

6.28.20  1:51 pm   What's your top ten favorite albums in no particular order

      i can't even think of 1

6.28.20  1:28 pm   give me some songs of joy

      i will

6.28.20  1:16 pm   Is it possible to un invent something?

      yes but you won't be aware of it

6.28.20  1:06 pm   What are your thoughts on lamps?

      such a turn on

6.28.20  1:04 pm   what is coffee

      it's like tea but way more brown. more brown than anything you've ever seen

6.28.20  12:59 pm   during the writing process for your non music video videos do you write the funny jingles at the same time or do you put words down and try to come up with those later

      words and music have to be written at the exact same time, at least if you wanna get the full mind control effect

6.28.20  12:20 pm   how do you turn an 8 bar theme into an 8 minute piece?

      play 'doctor' with the first 8 bars. diagnose it, figure out what it is, what it's meant to be, and that should help you put it in its place. If you wanna go to 8 minutes you may want to dip into the realm of non-song, to go with the song

6.28.20  12:07 pm   thoughts on batteries

      they are like piles of energy

6.28.20  11:53 am   whats your favorite ice cream flavor

      hot dog

6.28.20  11:28 am   do you have any advice on how to finally hard committing and produce a specific artistic goal/vision you've had planned unfettered because every time i try to start i get paralyzed with performance anxiety/imposter syndrome. (for context i've been doing concept work and building up to it for two years and i never know when i'm "ready") i figured i'd ask you since you've been making your own stuff forever with such drive and consistency, it's truly inspired.

      i think when you get desperate enough, you will be so angry with rage that you will steal your goals straight out of the morning sky

6.28.20  11:11 am   do you have any music suggestions

      for me it's more fun to let the music suggest things

6.28.20  10:51 am   what is your opinion on shrek 2

      if they can get up to 200, then that would get my attention

6.28.20  10:39 am   what's the difference between greenland and iceland?

      the amount of ice

6.28.20  10:34 am   What time or year are you most nostalgic for?

      the present

6.28.20  10:21 am   I hate it when people ask me what my favorite of anything is. I have so many and none at the same time and I overthink it and end up feeling horrible when I tell them a thing that is definitely not my favorite. What should I do? 

      use artistry to ride the wave of time, in general

6.28.20  10:16 am   what is music

      music is classified as a secret sauce

6.28.20  9:16 am   your songs are the best things in the world, are you currently working on new ones ? 

      yes and more

6.28.20  9:07 am   have you ever filled a latex glove with water then slapped people with it?

      no

6.28.20  8:59 am   can i get a sneakpeak on what oyu're working on? pls

      sure

6.28.20  8:51 am   What made you want to make music in the first place?

      music

6.28.20  8:31 am   how to fly

      you've been doing it for your whole life, but to understand how you are doing it, you could start telling stories

6.28.20  7:36 am   Best flavour?

      bland

6.28.20  7:35 am   Can I put pepper in a salt shaker?

      i dare you to try

6.28.20  6:34 am   why do you never use capital letters

      why do you ask questions with huge lies baked in

6.28.20  6:27 am   How do I get rid of negative thoughts?

      you could use positive thoughts

6.28.20  6:06 am   What do you think of grass?

      a perfect way to test the limits of the computational power of your universe

6.28.20  6:00 am   what is a pinecone

      it's like an award you can receive, for being very interesting

6.28.20  5:49 am   how to fly a plane

      most of them have a fly button i assume

6.28.20  5:32 am   Best ingredients for the best water?

      all you need is a Real Universe and you're well on your way to very good water

6.28.20  5:31 am   how did you come up with the idea of damien maymdien

      it is a reflection of the Soul of Humanity

6.28.20  5:25 am   What's the best cheese?

      the consensus, among the scientific community is, 'David Foster'

6.28.20  5:23 am   Shit, Bill, 'You're The Inspiration' by Chicago is REALLY clever. It kinda feels a little all over the place, but somehow it makes sense. What about it, do you feel, makes the song work the way it does (if it does for you, of course)?

     i believe the scientific term for what you are hearing is 'David Foster'

     Love your stuff, you're great.

6.28.20  4:37 am   Do you drive a nice car?

      put it this way...... it has a very nice amount of wheels (4)

6.28.20  4:20 am   Do you remember the days gone by?

      yes, i am also writing about subsequent days, to also be remembered in addition to those days

6.28.20  1:52 am   why is a chord?

      this is the universe's natural tendency to be friends with itself

6.28.20  1:33 am   Will all my curses be compensated with blessings at some point?

      that seems logical

6.28.20  1:16 am   are you going to release more music like might quit?

     extremely

     they are really catchy

6.28.20  1:13 am   where do you get your inspiration? 

      from the gutter

6.28.20  12:34 am   If you view a text are you reading or are you looking at a picture of words?

      both

6.28.20  12:30 am   How much musical theory do you know?

      as much as i want

6.28.20  12:21 am   How do I learn how to time travel?

      you have been doing it your entire life, but if you want to understand the process more you could try telling stories

6.28.20  12:15 am   i'm writing a song for guitar but i don't know what comes next. the chord progression goes c-e-f but what goes after f?

      it depends on what the non-chords are. for reference, an example of a non-chord could be a lyric, a potato, etc. any sort of thing of that nature

6.28.20  12:15 am   why does music sound good

      because of how bad it is

6.28.20  12:12 am   What's the worst thing about music?

      too good

6.28.20  12:12 am   thoughts on doorknobs?

      surprisingly difficult to open

6.28.20  12:10 am   what is the most complex chord progression you've ever used?

      C F
